title: Radish Cucumber Salad  🥗 | Summer Treats
content:
Salad recipe: Radish Cucumber Salad 🥗  Servings: 2 Duration: 5 mins Any salad or cold beverage during summer is so refreshing and good for health 😀 Today I’m sharing a freshly homemade salad which is easy to make and works as a brunch snack Cucumber and radish are the best pair in salad, they offer nice color combination, crunchy texture and tasty as well. This is a zero fat salad can serve anytime in a day and simple, classic and juicy recipe can make with in 5 minutes when things are handy ☺️ Health Benefits: Red radish:
  • Red radishes are packed with Vitamins E, A, C, B6, and K. Plus it's high on antioxidants, fiber, zinc, potassium, phosphorous, magnesium, copper, calcium, iron and manganese
Cucumber:  
  • Vitamins: A & C  Minerals : Iron, magnesium & potassium
Lettuce:
  • It has a high water content, making it a refreshing choice during hot weather. It also provides calcium, potassium, vitamin C, and folate. It’s low in fiber
Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Red Radish / Baby radish - 3 - Thinly diced
  • Mini Cucumber - 2 - diced
  • Lettuce - 1 Bowl - Chopped
  • Salt - 3/4 tsp (or as per taste)
  • Black Pepper Powder - Fine - 1/2 tsp
  • Dried basil - 1/2 tsp
  • Lemon juice - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • In a large mixing bowl add cucumber, lettuce & baby radish
  • Mix well & Add black Pepper Powder, salt, dried basil & lemon juice
  • Combine well & salad is ready to serve
  • Happy cooking & Enjoy your day 😀
